name: ModifyEnvironmentDataset
description:
Update dataset in a specific environment.

Use this tool to partially update an existing dataset within a specified environment using the project and dataset identifiers.

parameters.name: dataset_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the dataset to update within the environment.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project to access. Retrieve via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dataset_update_info
parameters.description: A JSON object with details for updating a dataset, including fields like `id`, `name`, `description`, `metadata`, and more.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
